title: Wrongfully banned
body:
I just played a game with a Zed that autolocked mid, inted mid 12 kills, literally talked shit ALL game, lied to the enemy team about me autolocked mid and threatened others on my team that he was going to burn their house down AND I JUST GOT FUCKING BANNED FOR THAT?!?!? I had him muted all game so I have no fucking clue what he was telling the enemy team besides the fact that I "autolocked mid". Show me the chat logs, because that was DEFINITELY a wrongful ban. This is complete utter fucking bullshit riot.

EDIT: 
This is what I was banned for btw

Game 1
Š Å T Å Ñ: i called mid
Š Å T Å Ñ: he called mii
Š Å T Å Ñ: not my fault he can't spell now is it
Š Å T Å Ñ: mii*
Š Å T Å Ñ: go ahead
Š Å T Å Ñ: do it
Š Å T Å Ñ: i dont think this team really cares tbh
Š Å T Å Ñ: all 4 of us know he called mii and hes throwing a fit
Š Å T Å Ñ: I could care less tbh
Š Å T Å Ñ: i mean obviously report him but i really dont care what he does
Š Å T Å Ñ: just a norm
Š Å T Å Ñ: as he feeds xd
Š Å T Å Ñ: ima just mute him
Š Å T Å Ñ: hmm
Š Å T Å Ñ: irelia
Š Å T Å Ñ: hes under the age 13.
Š Å T Å Ñ: you acn't argue with him
Š Å T Å Ñ: hes at the very least chat banned
Š Å T Å Ñ: lets just hope for a 14 day ban amirite
Š Å T Å Ñ: funny when we say were reporting he stops
Š Å T Å Ñ: hes still done for though
Š Å T Å Ñ: why? lmfao
Š Å T Å Ñ: he autolocked mid and fed 7 kills lol
Š Å T Å Ñ: literally 3 man mid 4 times now
Š Å T Å Ñ: and i still have to deal with zed lol
Š Å T Å Ñ: wonder if hes stil talking
Š Å T Å Ñ: how did relia get so fed
Š Å T Å Ñ: honestly dont evne care if we win
Š Å T Å Ñ: just want to type my essay on the zed report screen
Š Å T Å Ñ: what sorry ih ad you muted
Š Å T Å Ñ: neato
Š Å T Å Ñ: probably
Š Å T Å Ñ: i would be doing better but ya know
Š Å T Å Ñ: roadblock
Š Å T Å Ñ: dming
Š Å T Å Ñ: irelia you've said that 10 times
Š Å T Å Ñ: and you dont baron
Š Å T Å Ñ: stop

replies.body: It looks like you were somewhat picking on the guy from your own messages, but if you'd like we're more than happy to provide you with all of the context on why this ban was placed. Hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to open up that discussion one on one, I wouldn't want to give out your personal chat history on the boards.

How was I picking on the guy? He said report Kassadin auto locked in the beginning. I said in all chat that he was lying and that he didn't call mid properly. He then said do you want me to feed? I proceeded with sure I dont really care its pre 30 and its a norm. So he did and I muted him after he said he was going to burn our top laners house down and watch his parents die. I did open a ticket and will be waiting for those chat logs.
